song.title: World Domination
song.info:
1st place in combined demo compo at The Gathering 2003
If you want the soundtrack, download the demo and rename data.dat to data.rar... :)
Lyrics:
Back once again in control of base It's O-D-D in your mother-f**king face We're the Scene messiah and here's the revelation Two-thousand-and-three, ODD world domination
We're back...
Mad props out to Deux ex Machina And to Valium!Design, but not to Ephidrena All of their crew consists only of Lamers Quit the Scene, go home and be gamers
We molest the bigscreen in three dimensions While LfODD is building up the tension Other crews can piss the f**k off cause we eat your code raw Showing you all that we're f**king hardcore
Back once again in control of base It's O-D-D in your mother-f**king face We're the Scene messiah and here's the revelation Two-thousand-and-three, ODD world domination
ODD WORLD DOMINATION!
